traits.name: Heated Body
traits.description: A creature that touches the {NAME} or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes {1d10} fire damage.

traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.description: The {NAME}'s attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

traits.name: Superior Critical
traits.description: The {NAME}'s attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

traits.name: Great Weapon Fighting
traits.description: When the {NAME} rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack made with a melee weapon wielded with two hands, it can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2. The weapon must have the two-handed or versatile property for the {NAME} to gain this benefit.

traits.name: Protection
traits.description: When a creature the {NAME} can see attacks a target other than the {NAME} that is within 5 feet of it, the {NAME} can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. The {NAME} must be wielding a shield to use this trait.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The {NAME} regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the {NAME} takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the {NAME}'s next turn. The {NAME} dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
